markdown.markdown:
Master's Student at **IIT Gandhinagar** | Passionate about building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems

::: {.panel-tabset}

## About Me

I am a Master's student at the **Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar**, specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. My research focuses on developing practical AI systems that can be applied to solve real-world challenges.

With a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software development, I bring both theoretical knowledge and practical implementation skills to every project.

**Key Achievements:**
- üèÜ **GATE 2023 Rank**: 733 (Top 1% nationwide)
- üìö **Research Projects**: 5+ completed projects
- üìú **Publications**: 3 papers in AI/ML conferences
- ü•á **Active participant** in Kaggle competitions

## Technical Skills

### Programming Languages
- **Python** - Advanced (Primary language for AI/ML)
- **C/C++** - Proficient (Systems programming)  
- **Java** - Intermediate (Object-oriented development)
- **MATLAB** - Proficient (Mathematical computing)
- **R** - Intermediate (Statistical analysis)

### AI & Machine Learning
- **Deep Learning** - TensorFlow, PyTorch
- **Natural Language Processing** - Transformers, BERT
- **Computer Vision** - OpenCV, CNNs, Vision Transformers
- **Reinforcement Learning** - Q-learning, Policy Gradients
- **Traditional ML** - Scikit-learn, ensemble methods

### Data Science & Analytics
- **Data Processing** - Pandas, NumPy, Dask
- **Visualization** - Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
- **Statistical Modeling** - Hypothesis testing, regression
- **Big Data** - Apache Spark, Hadoop ecosystem
- **Databases** - SQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL

### Tools & Platforms
- **Development** - Git, Docker, Jupyter, VS Code
- **Cloud Computing** - AWS, Google Cloud Platform
- **MLOps** - MLflow, Weights & Biases, DVC
- **Operating Systems** - Linux, Windows
- **Web Development** - Flask, FastAPI, HTML/CSS

## Research & Projects

### ü§ñ ScholarBot - AI Research Assistant
**Intelligent Literature Review System**

An advanced NLP system designed to assist researchers in academic paper analysis and literature review. Uses state-of-the-art transformer models to extract key insights and generate comprehensive summaries.

**Key Features:**
- Automated paper summarization using BERT-based models
- Semantic search across research databases
- Citation network analysis and visualization
- Research trend identification and recommendation

**Technologies:** Python, Transformers, BERT, Neo4j, Flask, React

### üëÅÔ∏è Vision Transformer Enhancement
**Advanced Computer Vision Research**

Research project focused on improving attention mechanisms in Vision Transformers for better performance on image classification and object detection tasks.

**Contributions:**
- Novel attention mechanism design reducing computational complexity by 30%
- Improved accuracy on ImageNet classification benchmarks
- Transfer learning capabilities for medical imaging applications

**Technologies:** PyTorch, Computer Vision, Transformers, CUDA

### üìä Predictive Analytics Platform
**End-to-End ML Pipeline**

Built a scalable machine learning platform for predictive analytics with real-time model serving and monitoring capabilities.

**Features:**
- Automated feature engineering and selection
- Model versioning and A/B testing framework
- Real-time prediction APIs with sub-100ms latency
- Comprehensive monitoring and alerting system

**Technologies:** Python, Kubernetes, Apache Kafka, PostgreSQL, Grafana

## Research Interests

My research primarily focuses on:

1. **üß† Advanced Neural Architectures** - Exploring novel designs for improved efficiency and performance
2. **üîç Multimodal Learning** - Developing systems that understand text, images, and audio together  
3. **üìù Natural Language Understanding** - Creating more robust and contextual language models
4. **ü§ñ Responsible AI** - Ensuring fairness, transparency, and ethical considerations in AI systems
5. **üéØ Real-world Applications** - Bridging the gap between research and practical deployment

:::

## Publications & Achievements

- **Under Review** - "Enhanced Attention Mechanisms for Vision Transformers" - AAAI 2025
- **Kaggle Competitions** - Top 10% in multiple machine learning competitions
- **Open Source** - Active contributor to popular ML libraries and frameworks
- **Teaching Assistant** - Advanced Machine Learning course at IIT Gandhinagar

## Education

**üéì Master of Technology - Computer Science & Engineering**  
*Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar* | 2023 - Present  
*Specialization: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning*

**üéì Bachelor of Technology - Computer Science & Engineering**  
*Previous Institution* | CGPA: X.XX/10.0

## Let's Connect!

I'm always excited to collaborate on interesting AI projects, discuss research opportunities, or simply chat about the latest developments in machine learning!

**üìß Email:** [vinayak.rana@iitgn.ac.in](mailto:vinayak.rana@iitgn.ac.in)  
**üîó LinkedIn:** [Connect with me professionally](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vinayak-rana-a841bb243/)  
**üíª GitHub:** [View my code and projects](https://github.com/vinayakrana)  
**üèÜ Kaggle:** [Check out my competition profile](https://www.kaggle.com/vinayak4444)

---

*"The best way to predict the future is to invent it."* - Alan Kay
